name: @nicolasflamel/secp256k1-zkp-react
description: React Native module for parts of libsecp256k1-zkp

scripts.prepublishOnly: wget "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/secp256k1-zkp/archive/master.zip" && unzip "./master.zip" && rm "./master.zip" && find "./secp256k1-zkp-master/" -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 ! -name "src" ! -name "include" -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf "./secp256k1-zkp-master/src/asm/" && rm -rf "./secp256k1-zkp-master/src/java/" && wget "https://github.com/NicolasFlamel1/Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper/archive/refs/heads/master.zip" && unzip "./master.zip" && rm "./master.zip" && sed -i 's/explicit_bzero(\(.*\),/memset(\1, 0,/g' "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/main.cpp" && find "./Secp256k1-zkp-WASM-Wrapper-master/" -mindepth 1 ! -name "main.cpp" -exec rm -rf {} +

author: Nicolas Flamel
